components.label: General Intstructions
components.placeholder: This is where you enter the  instructions!

actions.name: get value
get content
actions.schemaDefinition: schema = { content: data.settings.generalInstruction }

actions.name: set form props

components.label: overCount
components.content:
Over
0

actions.name: get content
actions.schemaDefinition:
const template = `
Over
${!!data.criticalCount? data.criticalCount : 0}
` schema = { content: template }

actions.name: repeat sections
get label
actions.schemaDefinition:
const label = data.settings.cs_names_array[instance.parent.parent._rowIndex]
schema = { label }

actions.name: track critical
actions.customAction:
if(!!data.settings.cs_critical_limits && typeof data.settings.cs_lower_limit_1 === 'number' && typeof value === 'number' && value > data.settings.cs_lower_limit_1) {
  const currentCount = !!data.criticalCount ? data.criticalCount : 0
  data.criticalCount = currentCount + 1
  
  form.cs_tracker.criticals[instance.parent._rowIndex] = data.settings.cs_lower_limit_1
  form.cs_tracker.values[instance.parent._rowIndex] = value
  
  instance.triggerChange()
}

actions.name: get label
actions.schemaDefinition:
const label = data.settings.cs_names_array[instance.parent.parent._rowIndex]
schema = { label }

trigger.javascript: result = typeof instance._data.tempSlider === 'number' && data.settings.temperatureFieldType === 'slider' && !!form.cs_tracker?.criticals && !!form.cs_tracker?.values && (form.cs_tracker.criticals[instance.parent._rowIndex] !== data.settings.cs_lower_limit_1 || form.cs_tracker.values[instance.parent._rowIndex] !== instance._data.tempSlider)

actions.name: track critical
actions.schemaDefinition:
if(!!data.settings.cs_critical_limits && typeof data.settings.cs_lower_limit_1 === 'number' && typeof value === 'number' && value > data.settings.cs_lower_limit_1) {
  const currentCount = !!data.criticalCount ? data.criticalCount : 0
  data.criticalCount = currentCount + 1
  
  form.cs_tracker.criticals[instance.parent._rowIndex] = data.settings.cs_lower_limit_1
  form.cs_tracker.values[instance.parent._rowIndex] = value
  
  instance.triggerChange()
}
